1514430.name: Reek N' Havok
1514430.description:
A sandbox strategy game where you control Reek and Havok; two devilish creatures that aim to destabilize a town through chaos and destruction.

Disguised as a civilian, they can poison wells, pollute the food, start fires and disrupt supply caravans, all whilst evading the law.
The town itself will try and fix the damage caused, as well as bring the fiends to justice. This is where discretion and careful planning are key!

Feel free to contact us through the community hub, your feedback and suggestions are invaluable to improving the quality of the game.
1514430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
